name: Shadows of Shadowmere
summary: A dark urban fantasy campaign set in the gothic city of Shadowmere. The party must navigate the dangerous politics between vampire clans and werewolf packs while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the entire city.

scenes.name: Arrival in the City
scenes.summary: The party arrives in Shadowmere during the annual Festival of Shadows, unaware of the dark secrets that lurk beneath the celebrations.
